item.title: Galaxy S (“T-Mobile Vibrant”) Tethering
item.description: Seeing Tim Bray’s post on how much he loves tethering his Nexus One reminded me that I wanted to document that this does, indeed, work on a rooted Galaxy S.

item.title: Improving a Samsung Galaxy S
item.description: I stood in line almost two years ago for the G1.
